link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Total shares debt and free reserve s=(i) Paid-up Equity Capital + (ii) Preference shares to be compulsorily convertible into equity + (iii) Perpetual Debt Instrument (Not to exceed 15% of Aggregate Tier I Capital as on March 31 of the previous year) + (a) Statutory / Spl. Reserves Under Sec. 45IC of RBI Act, 1934. + (b) General Reserves + (c) Share Premium + (d) Capital Reserves (representing surplus on sale of assets held in separate account) + (e) Debenture Redemption Reserve + (f) Capital Redemption Reserve + (g) Credit Balance in Profit and Loss Account + (h) Other free reserves (to be specified))" do not tally.

Identity "Total = ((v) Accumulated balance of loss + (vi) Deferred Revenue Expenditure + (vii) Deferred Tax Asset (Net) + (viii) Other Intangible Assets + (ix) Others (to be specified in remarks column))" do not tally.
Identity "(x) Owned Fund =Shares Debt and Free Reserve less Total Adjustment" do not tally.

Identity "(xiii) Total =((xi) Investment in shares of :(a) Subsidiaries + (xi) Investment in shares of :(b) Companies in the same Group + (xi) Investment in shares of :(c) Other non-banking financial companies + (xii) The book value of debentures, bonds, outstanding loans and advances, bills purchased and discounted (including hire-purchase and lease finance) made to, and deposits with(a) Subsidiaries + (xii) The book value of debentures, bonds, outstanding loans and advances, bills purchased and discounted (including hire-purchase and lease finance) made to, and deposits with(b) Companies in the same Group)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Adjustment to calculate net owned funds in excess of owned funds = (Total Adjustment to calculate net owned funds, If Owned funds < 0; Else Total Adjustment to calculate net owned funds in excess of owned funds = (Total Adjustment to calculate net owned funds - (0.10 X Owned funds))" do not tally.

Identity "Net owned funds = Owned funds - Total adjustments to calculate net owned funds if Owned funds is less than 0, else ( Owned funds - Total adjustments to calculate net owned funds in excess of owned funds)." do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Assets = (Total Loans & Advances + Hire Purchase and Lease Assets + Investments (Current & Non-Current) + Cash and Bank Balances + Other financial assets + Total Other Current Assets + Premises and Fixed Assets + Miscellaneous expenditure (to the extent not written off or adjusted) + Profit and Loss Account (Accumulated Loss)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Of which, Total Financial Assets = (Total Loans & Advances + Hire Purchase and Lease Assets + Investments (Current & Non-Current))" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Financial Assets to Total Assets (%) = (Of which, Total Financial Assets /Total Assets if Total Assets < > 0; Else Value of Financial Assets to Total Assets (%) = 0)" do not tally.
Identity "Net Lease Income = (i) Gross Lease Income plus Add/Less:Lease Equalisation Credit/Charge " do not tally.
Identity "(iv) Interest Income = (a) Interest on Inter-corporate Deposits plus (b) Interest on Other Loans" do not tally.
Identity "(v) Investment Income = (a) Interest plus (b) Dividend" do not tally.

Identity "Total Fund-Based Income = (Net Lease Income + (ii) Hire Purchase Income (including compensation charges) + (iii) Bills Discounting Income + (iv) Interest Income + (v) Investment Income + (vi) Profit on Sale of Investments + (vii) Other fund-based income)" do not tally.
Identity "Total Income from Financial Business = (Total Fund-Based Income + Total Fee Based Income + 3. Miscellaneous income)" do not tally.
Identity "C. Total Income = Total Income from Financial Business plus B. Income from Non-Financial Business" do not tally.
Identity "Financial Income/Total Income (%) =Total Income from Financial Business / C. Total Income" do not tally.
If the reported value for "(h) Other free reserves (to be specified)" is not zero, then please provide remarks in "Remarks" column and if value is zero, then remarks are not required.
If the reported value for "(v) Others (to be specified in remarks column)" is not zero, then please provide remarks in "Remarks" column and if value is zero, then remarks are not required.

1.Total Loans and Advances should be equal to sum of ((i) Out of 1 above - Qualifying asset for Micro Finance Institution (NBFC-MFI) + (ii) Out of 1 above - Assets in infrastructure loans for Infrastructure Finance Company (IFC) + (iii) Out of 1 above- Loans eligible for factoring business- NBFC Factor + (iv) Out of 1 above - Loans to Subsidiaries/ Group Companies- NBFC- Core Investment Company + (v) Out of 1 above -Loans & Advances to Others).

"Reporting of ""Remarks"" is mandatory, If value for ""Other financial assets"" is not 0.
Reporting of ""Remarks"" is not mandatory, If value for ""Other financial assets"" is 0."
